featured.text: His parents were very liberal in their ways of education.

definition.zh_def: 自由的，開放的，包容的，通常指政治或社會上支持個人自由和權利的觀點。
definition.en_def: Open to new behavior or opinions; willing to discard traditional values.
definition.example: She has a liberal approach to education, encouraging creativity and critical thinking.
